prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Brass, Piano, Reed, Drums, but without Guitar.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Bass, Brass, Piano, Reed, and Drums, but no Guitar.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Bass, Brass, Piano, Reed, and Drums, omitting the Guitar.

Style 3:
Guitar-less, this song is made up of Bass, Brass, Piano, Reed, and Drums.
